document_data.name: The Swordsmith's House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Swordsmith's House''' was a finer quality inn found in the village of [[Highcastle]] in late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Although they were open for most of the year, their doors would close during winter months for lack of business.
document_data.Prices: A room for rent at the Swordsmith's House cost 12 [[sp]] per night.
